entry.title: Technical Knit Tank
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type:
Price: 25.00

Our Technical Knit Tank is a must-have for any active wardrobe. The seamless moisture-wicking fabric features ventilation panels along the sides, front and back to ensure comfort when working out. The integrated bra support is ideal for floor-based exercises and other low intensity workouts. Made from 94% Polyamide 6% Elastane.

entry.title: Technical Knit Sports Bra
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Sale
Price: 25.00

Technical Knit racerback sports bra made from our seamless fabric in a vibrant azure colour. Designed for a strong look in our signature second skin fabric. To ensure maximum comfort and support the bra boasts ventilation mesh panels under the bust and at the back. Wear it for low-mid intensity workouts. Made from 94% Polyamide 6% Elastane.

Model is 5'10, waist 24" and wears size small.

entry.title: Odyssey V2 Mesh Tank
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Sale
Price: 70.00

The Odyssey V2 Mesh Tank is a standout layering style. This fully breathable performance tank features colourful technical tape that highlights the shoulder with a bold stripe print. Move with ease, with the sleek bonded seams and side slits for increased mobility.

Mesh: 68% Polyamide, 32% Elastane. Contrast: 73% Polyamide, 27% Elastane

Model is 5'10, waist 24" and wears size small.

entry.title: Performance Cross Back Tank
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Tops
Price: 35.00

This lightweight, fitted tank is a must-have for any wardrobe. The fine, moisture-wicking fabric, internal support at the chest and mesh insert at the small of the back ensure comfort when working out, while the slim fit, dipped hem, delicate straps and loop over cross back make it eminently wearable for any occasion. Made from 72% Polyamide 28% Elastane.

Model is 5'10 / 182cm, bust 32" / 76cm and wears size small

entry.title: Aerial Tank
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: sale
Price: 50.00

Update your workout basics with our striking Aerial Tank. Designed for a loose fit, in our iconic mesh fabric with bold Violet hem, it is the ideal layering piece for transitioning to and from the gym. Pair it with leggings and a sports bra or tank. Made from 70% Polyamide 30% Elastane.

entry.title: Racer Sports Bra
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Sports Bras
Price: 30.00

SHOP THE LOOK

Our design team have pushed the boundaries on design and performance by using a new print process to achieve this luxury metallic finish. Made with a racerback shape and mesh ventilation at the front and back. This sports bra has removable bra cups. Due to the nature of the print process the pattern will vary slightly on each sports bra. Made from MAIN: 59% Polyamide, 41% Elastane. MESH: 80% Polyamide/ 20% Elastane

Model is 5'11 / 182cm, bust 32" / 76cm and wears size small

entry.title: Performance 7/8 Leggings
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Leggings
Price: 85.00

Figure-enhancing workout staple that lifts and elongates. The tight-weave wicking fabric, faced waistband, internal structural layer at the rear and inner-thigh ventilation panels create a supportive, comfortable and uniquely flattering fit. Key zip pocket embedded within yoke to add further functional details. Made from 59% Polyamide 41% Elastane.

Model is 5'11 / 182cm, bust 32" / 76cm and wears size small

entry.title: Hyper Crop
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type:
Price: 25.00

The Hyper Crop is available in dual colours, Garnet and White. Inspired by circuitry, the Hyper print design is knitted into the fabric and placed strategically to highlight the female form. Built with second skin circular knit fabric, this crop is a seamless choice for low impact, floor-based exercises. Made from 74% Polyamide, 21% Polyester, 5% Elastane.

The Odyssey Crop is a signature Lucas Hugh style for the season. Opalescent technical taping offers textural structure to highlight and contour the body while a full mesh back allows for breathability. Focusing on design, breathability and functionality this crop is made for mid-low impact activities. Made from 59% Polyamide, 41% Elastane.

A standout style from the Limitless collection, The Kubrick Sports Bra balances style and function to the highest degree. Inspired by obsidian rock formations, contrasting gloss and matte fabrics have been placed with care to flatter the female form. Focusing on design, breathability and functionality this bra is made for mid-low impact activities and crafted from 59% Polyamide, 41% Elastane.

entry.title: Quantum Crop
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type:
Price: 30.00

The Quantum Crop is a long line bra with opalescent technical taping and mesh detailing. Made with internal lining, bonded seams and elasticated hems means it offers support for low-mid intensity workouts such as yoga or pilates. The main fabric is UPF 50+ making it ideal for gym, walking or on the go workouts. Pair this piece with Quantum leggings. Made from 59% Polyamide, 41% Elastane.

It features an inner bra support and is crafted from moisture-wicking fabric, making it ideal for the gym, walking or 'on the go'. Pair this piece with matching Quantum Leggings, shorts or track pants. Made from 59% Polyamide, 41% Elastane.

The classic Technical Knit Adjustable Sports Bra, crafted in our seamless circular knit fabric, is updated with the seasonal Strobe design. This bra features adjustable straps to give you the perfect fit with removable cups for optional coverage and a plain ribbed waistband for comfort and support. entry.title: Performance 7/8 Leggings
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Sale
Price: 55.00 - 65.00 (4 variants)

This season get your classic Performance 7/8 legging, designed for a cropped fit, in our dynamic new Pinstripe print. Wear these compression leggings for high-intensity workouts in and outside of the gym. The style is designed with a mid-rise elasticated waistband, reflective triangles for visibility, pinhole mesh ventilation panels and a seamless zip pocket for key storage.

Model is 5'10, waist 24" and wears size extra-small. If you are in between sizes, we recommend sizing up. Made from 59% Polyamide 41% Elastane.
